Articles.Content:
Who is working on KSP? It\'s alwayse a 'they' kindish word I hear. But I only hear updates from HarvesteR. With working on I mean full time. With full time I mean that it\'s the only thing you do for job and not just making a terrain engine and than move on to other projects (of Squad?).

If it\'s only HarvesteR, what if there were 2 people working on KSP? KSP^2 = more epicness ?

Who is working on KSP? It\'s alwayse a 'they' kindish word I hear. But I only hear updates from HarvesteR. With working on I mean full time. With full time I mean that it\'s the only thing you do for job and not just making a terrain engine and than move on to other projects (of Squad?).

If it\'s only HarvesteR, what if there were 2 people working on KSP? KSP^2 = more epicness ?

There is a team, Harv\'s just the lead guy.

Also, too many coders can have the same problems as too many chefs in the same kitchen: Everyone has their own idea as to where they want the game to go.
The entire team is nine if the Readme is accurate.

Check the member listing and sort by Position. Those listed as Team Kerbal (4) are programmers. Harv is listed as Administrator and I know Alex handles support. The other two may just be Squad employees.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
